fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Customs, Business and Industry, Single market, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Digital Single market, IoT, Innovation Policy, standards and intellectual property protection and enforcement
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Sisvel is a world leader in fostering innovation and managing intellectual property. The Group identifies, evaluates and maximizes the value of IP assets for its partners around the world, providing firms with a revenue stream which can be reinvested in innovation for the generation of future revenues. The Sisvel Group supports the growth of the technology industry by fostering R&D and managing licensing programs, designed to unlock the value of intellectual property rights arising from investments in innovation and at the same time, assists potential licensees by simplifying access to new patented technologies.Sisvel has more than 35 years of experience in the IP licensing sector, with a focus on wireless communication, digital video technologies, audio and video coding.
